TEXT.TITLE: COLONIAL AMERICAN BANKSHARES CORP <CABK> 1ST QTR
TEXT.BODY: Shr 52 cts vs 40 cts Qtly div 18 cts vs 15 cts prior Net 793,740 vs 603,661 NOTE: Share adjusted for 10 pct stock dividend in November 1986. Dividend pay May One, record April 25. Reuter
